reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and appreciate its perfect length, though some note it's not true to size. The fabric receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others describe it as terrible and super thin. Customers disagree on the comfort level, with some finding it very comfortable while others say it's not comfortable to wear. The dress wrinkles easily, and customers disagree on its ease of movement, with some noting it's hard to move arms in it. Customers disagree on whether the dress is see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute dress
items.body: This dress was not expensive and I got so many compliments on it. It’s really pretty nice fabric. It’s not see-through. It’s not too short. I am 58 132 pounds and a size small fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars HALLOWEEN COSTUME FABRIC!
items.body: Everyone says the fabric looks and feels cheap in person but no one described it in the most effective, understandable way: it has the appearance and texture of fabric from your average Halloween costume. Even the oversized, visible seams are screaming Spirit Halloween! Haha it's a beautiful dress design but the fit is poor and it's cheap in a very specific way that makes it unfashionable. I'm sure different orders of this dress come from different factories like many shops on Amazon, so many customers will get some variations of this dress that aren't the same as what I received. All those returning it for cheap quality got the Spirit Halloween version though. Read more
items.author: Courtney

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a cape
items.body: Measurements are not right for length. Cute dress but super cheap material (100% polyester). Not super comfortable or easy to wear. Very thin. Not super stretchy. Read more
items.author: Addie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect event dress! Quality is 10/10!
items.body: The red color is perfect for the holidays. The satin material is not too thin and falls perfectly. I’m 5’6” and the length is perfection. Very comfortable and can be worn for so many things! Read more
items.author: Reilly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but big/ loose
items.body: Very loose and big around chest. Beautiful dress if you are good at sewing a pleat sewing. Read more
items.author: Jeremiah M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute for standing still, Hard to move arms
items.body: All over it for great. The sleeves were a little long and the flap at the top make it hard to move my arms. If you are not planning on moving alot in this dress it would be great! Read more
items.author: Taylor Ann

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful quality and xs fits like a medium
items.body: Dress was see through, not the same color as the picture, and was about two sizes too big. The material is super thin and not stretchy. It’s not comfortable at all and costs too much for this quality. Iv bought things of better SHEIN with better quality. I don’t recomend Read more
items.author: Bridget S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Nice & comfy for a night out. Material is light and wrinkles easy, but easy to fix it. Read more
items.author: Martha

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Burgundy, Shallow Brown, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Red, Rose Red, Pink, Purple, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
